typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CoopID as string,
		CoopName as string,
		ProdID as integer,
		ProdName as string,
		ManifestNum as integer,
		LT_No as integer,
		CustID as integer,
		CustName as string,
		HaulerID as string,
		HaulerName as string,
		ScaleHeavy as integer,
		SchPickUpDate as timestamp,
		ActualPickUpDate as timestamp,
		SchDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		RouteNum as string,
		Rejected as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'DataSource',
	wildcardPaths:['*.xlsx']) ~> MIMSservice
MIMSservice sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CoopID as string,
		CoopName as string,
		ProdID as double,
		ProdName as string,
		ManifestNum as string,
		LT_No as double,
		CustID as double,
		CustName as string,
		HaulerID as string,
		HaulerName as string,
		ScaleHeavy as double,
		SchPickUpDate as timestamp,
		ActualPickUpDate as timestamp,
		SchDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		RouteNum as string,
		Rejected as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> tblService
